scripts.db:destroy: npm run compile-scripts && node postgres/build/dbExecute destroy
scripts.db:create: npm run compile-scripts && node postgres/build/dbExecute create
scripts.db:seed: npm run compile-scripts && node postgres/build/dbExecute seed
scripts.db:reseed: npm run compile-scripts && node postgres/build/dbExecute reseed
scripts.start:prod: docker-compose build && docker-compose up && docker-compose down
scripts.start:dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run start:api:local" "npm run start:exchange:local" "npm run start:users:local"
scripts.start: if [ "$NODE_ENV" != "production" ]; then npm run start:dev; else npm run start:prod; fi
